Uses of Class
rt.main.actors.Block

  • Packages that use Block 
    Package Description
    rt.main  
    rt.main.actors  
    rt.main.scenes.worlds  

    • Uses of Block in rt.main

      Methods in rt.main that return Block 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Block Camera.getFacingBlock()
      This function is used to obtain the block that the camera is currently "looking" at.

    • Uses of Block in rt.main.actors

      Methods in rt.main.actors that return Block 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Block Block.intersectsWithRay(Ray ray)
      This function is used to check if a block intersects with an array.
      Block Block.setSize(int size)
      Deprecated. 
      this function is deprecated since block-sizes will be hard-coded in the future.
      Block Block.setType(BlockType blocktype)
      Used to set the BlockType enumeration for the block.
      Block Block.tickle()
      This function's purpose is to prevent drawing of sides that are blocked by another block.
